document.full_text: former braves pitcher john smoltz struggled in his nationwide tour debut, shooting a 15-over 87 on saturday in the rain-delayed south georgia classic to miss the cut by 27 strokes.
document.title: smoltz misses nationwide cut by 27 strokes
lines_and_colors: former braves pitcher john smoltz struggled in his nationwide tour debut, shooting a 15-over 87 on saturday in the rain-delayed south georgia classic to miss the cut by 27 strokes.
